svg.title: MPLP — The Agent OS Protocol
svg.desc: Official banner for the Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol (MPLP). MPLP is the world's first open, vendor-neutral Agent OS Layer Protocol defining how AI agents live, coordinate, remain governed, and stay observable across all frameworks, runtimes, tools, and vendors.

rdf:Description.dc:title: MPLP — The Agent OS Protocol Banner
rdf:Description.dc:description: Official GitHub README banner for the Multi-Agent Lifecycle Protocol. The Lifecycle Protocol for AI Agents. Observable. Governed. Vendor-neutral.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Bangshi Beijing Network Technology Limited Company
rdf:Description.dc:rights: Copyright 2025 Bangshi Beijing Network Technology Limited Company. Apache-2.0 License.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: MPLP, Agent OS, Multi-Agent Protocol, AI Agents, Lifecycle Protocol, Governance, Observability

svg.text: The Lifecycle Protocol for AI Agents
